parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID.

>  You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the IDs of all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances in a specific region.

parameters.name: Extensions
parameters.description: The name of the extension that you want to install. Separate multiple extension names with commas (,).

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID.

>  You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~86912~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
